byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and BROOKS BARNES
byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting.

abstract: News Corp stockholders re-elect Rupert Murdoch and rest of board, but their dissent at annual meeting leads Murdoch to apologize to them for phone-hacking scandal.
snippet: Rupert Murdoch apologized for the hacking scandal and defended the company’s leadership.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

lead_paragraph: Rupert Murdoch apologized for the hacking scandal and defended the company’s leadership.

headline.main: At Annual Meeting, Murdoch Spars With Investors
headline.print_headline: Murdoch Apologizes for Hacking Scandal After Investor Dissent
headline.seo: Murdoch Spars With Investors at Annual Meeting
